summary: Hides pretty much every single playable helmet in the game.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Hide all headgear
Version: 1.0
Date: 3/2/2012
Category: Armour
Author(s): Xenus87
Source: 

Description
===========

Makes pretty much every single playable helmet in the game invisible, so you can admire your characters face/hair that you spend so much time designing.


All helmets are now invisible, and have been moved to the circlet slot.

Also the Heavy .esp has a fix for the Falmar Helmet, so that heavy armour perks now work with it.(It was flagged in the CK to use light armour perks.)

Install
=======
1. Copy the .esp file to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s) \\ add to plugins.txt (C:\\Users\\USERNAME\\AppData\\Local\\Skyrim)

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the .esp file from \\Skyrim\\Data\\

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
There may be a couple of helmets that don\'t dissapear that I missed.

History
=======

1.0, 2006/10/28 - Initial release.
